Frankie, that's great to hear. Elsa replied excitedly.

So Elsa and and Francis finished their call and Elsa turn back to Sartana smiling.

Well It looks like my brother needs to see you so in a few days he will be here to visit. Elsa explained to Sartana.

Sartana ran and hugged Elsa to the news.

Elsa blushed but held him tight knowing she has a good friend to relate to.


Elsa do you remember me from school a few years back? Sartana asked.

Well I've only gone to school for a few years. Elsa replied.

Well do you remember who helped your father to make you? Sartana asked.

Somewhat? but what brought up that question? Elsa asked.

Well what did he look like?Sartana asked.

Black eyes, black hair, and he had an interesting set of teeth. Elsa replied.

Elsa think about what you said.

Elsa looked at him and thought,then looked at him again because she noticed something.

Sartana did you place my hearts within me? Elsa asked

Yes Elsa all those years ago and I never got to talk to you over that night.Sartana replied.

Well I think the best time would be to talk to me evening. Elsa replied.
1252212.title: Francis comes to visit

12522121.content:
Elsa and Sartana agreed that later that day they would talk about that fateful night, but until then they went back inside to prepare for the upcoming school year.

When the two of them had entered the door they were greeted by Sibella.

Well my goodness it seems as though what my brother had said was true.Sibella said enthusiastically.

Wow news really does spread fast.Sartana replied.

Well Sartana you have a lot to explain over what had happened to you over the past ten years. Sibella replied.

Alright then, lets start with the fact you stood me up during the spring ball and humiliated me, then I had to watch friends of mine die in my arms, and
lastly My father paid the ice goblin mafia to freeze me for ten years so I wouldn't be in his way when he created the blood oath for his purposes.Which by the way I have taken care of so I control it. Sartana rambled.

So why couldn't you destroy the blood oath? Sibella asked.

Well if you read the fine print it is possible,but for that to happen I would need to die and you girls would receive consequences. Sartana replied not enthused.

Sibella was tired of listening to Sartana's attitude at this point and walked away in a huff.
12522121.title: This evening

125221212.content:
Things got awkward for Sartana as he realized someone got pissed at him for hearing his thoughts and the truth to the question he was asked.

DAMMIT WOMAN why do you always get the last say. Sartana asked.

Well if you think that way then if I ever talk to you it will be when hell freezes over. Sibella shouted.

Sartana and Sibella go though their routines for the day and when it came to supper they spoke not a word to each other and had to ask others to answer questions for each other

using them as a barrier between themselves.

This went on for days and then the days turned to weeks Sartana started to loose it due to how miserable ha became with out her.

Sartana decided to go to his hide out to try and relax Sartana pulled out his old cinema projector and found a movie to watch and grabbed found a bottle of brandy from one of his old parties.

The movie he decided to watch was A Street Car Named Desire. Well if I get even more sad from the movie I could at least take a few shots. Sartana thought.

The events for the main character get worse and worse and with each bad event Sartana takes a shot.

Sartana falls asleep to the movie. and wakes up at the dead of night.

When he wakes up however he wants to apologize to Sibella but in his mind he is about to apologize to Stella because in a twisted drunken fate he thinks he is the main character of the movie Stanley, yet a part of his mind is still conscious and knows who he is wanting to talk to.

He leaves his hide out and gets to the perch of Sibella's room.

HEY SIBELLA! Sartana shouted

SIBELLA!.....SIBELLA! Sartana keeps shouting.

Sartana is met with Elsa at the top of the perch.

You should have came to your senses earlier in the day at a point in which you could talk to her. Elsa stated

Where's Sibella I need to talk to her.Sartana said in a broken down drunken voice.

Sibella heard the commotion and walked out she looked at him still silent from the event of the fight.

Sartana took one look and broke down. Sibella I'm sorry I never meant to get you upset I've just had a rough time adjusting but that was no way to act toward you I'm so sorry Sibella.

Sartana began balling seeing her mad. and in his drunken state he fell backwards.
125221212.title: stand your ground

choices: go to sleep it can wait
1252212121.content:
As he falls back he closes his eyes for the worst screaming bloody murder when he felt someone grab him by the shirt and pulls him back onto the balcony, and held onto him.

When he opened his eyes he saw he was being embraced by Sibella who was at this point crying a little.

Sartana held her and he began to cry tears of joy knowing the fight was finally over.

Elsa had smiled at the scene knowing that things were going to get better now that the differences between the three of them had settled.

Elsa picked the two of them up hugging them. Sartana smiled and was a tad shocked to see such strength in a thin elegant frame.

The three of them went back inside to go back to bed.

You know Sartana I'm kinda glad this happened. Sibella stated.

And why would that be? Sartana asked

Because I feel a lot closer to you now which makes me feel like a bond of trust was created. Sibella replied

I want to make a point we all made mistakes with each other before we got here but this gives us a chance to start over and forget about what happened before you got frozen Sartana. Elsa replied.
What about the guys I can't forget about that mistake if it weren't for me they would still be here. Sartana replied

One thing I always believed is even if you killed a monster they don't stay dead for long. Elsa replied.

Thanks Elsa you gave me a great idea and I'll get to work in the morning I am beat. Sartana replies.

Sartana went to his room got into his pajamas brushed his teeth and got into bed and just as he was about to turn out the light he heard people at his door..
1252212121.title: Sartana's Heroine

12522121211.content:
Sartana quietly gets up from his bed and cracks open the door to see Phantasma,Winnie and Tanis talking in the hall.

Seriously just like that and everything is back to normal with them? I don't believe it Phantasma explained.

I don't know Johnny was depressed i am ashamed that he would turn to the bottle but he wouldn't do anything to force people to do what he wanted or force people to like him Phantasma if that's what your saying. Winnie replied.

Yea well I don't trust him either If we are to trust him we need to prove that he is able to be around. Tanis replied.

That seems fair enough, but I'm telling you guys I've know him since I was little we can trust him. Winnie replies.

How have you known him for so long. Phantasma asked.

Well before he got frozen he was picked on a lot at school and being that his dad would beat him he didn't stick around home. due to him not being around the house he took up odd jobs and such to earn his way through school. At one point he worked at the restaurant downtown as a waiter. That stopped a few months later when they couldn't have him there anymore as an employee. Winnie explained.

Why? Tanis asked.

Regulation codes prevented it. Winnie answered.

At another point he was my babysitter and this was when I was still a pup even when I bit him a few times from teething he never got mad at me Winnie continued.

Alright but we are still checking to make sure Phantasma reassured.

The three of the returned to their rooms and went back to bed.
12522121211.title: inspect it

125221212111.content:
Sartana woke up the next morning determined to fix his mistakes and prove to everyone that's he is able to be around.

As he walked outside of his room he saw the girls huddled close whispering about something.

He thought for a moment thinking whether to try and figure out what they are up to or not mess with their personal space.

After a few moments of thinking he decided not to worry what they are doing right now and he headed downstairs.

He went to the kitchen and was greeted by the teachers and Miss Grimwood.

Uh would you guys mind if I made breakfast for everyone. Sartana asked.

That sounds splendid Sartana. Miss Grimwood replied.

Shaggy and Scooby were also interested in this news.

Sartana shooed the teachers out in the nicest way possible so that he could get to work.

Sartana searched the cupboards, the pantry and the fridge to get ingredients.

He started be making some batter for pancakes got the coffee maker going and fried up eggs,bacon hash-browns and sausage.

Once the meal was ready he called everyone into the dining room where he presented a breakfast for everyone.

The girls sat down and made a plate of food for themselves.

Phantasma was about to be the first one to try the meal Sartana made but hesitated when she remembered the conversation from last night.

Is there something wrong Phantasma? I was exited to see you be the first one to try my cooking. Sartana stated.

She smiled sweetly and took a bite.
125221212111.title: the next morning

1252212121111.content:
Phantasma couldn't help but smile as she kept eating the meal Sartana had prepared for them.

Once Phantasma started to eat everyone else soon followed.

"Sartana I didn't know you were such a good cook?" Sibella said happily.

Well it involved a lot of trial and error but once I got the hang of it cooking became really fun. Sartana replied.

"So Sartana are you enjoying your first month here at school?" Miss Grimwood asked.

The ghouls looked at him as he was thinking about what to reply. Sartana got nervous but thought about everything considered and said "Actually all considered yea I am."

Sibella and Elsa smiled at the answer he gave while the others were just confused.

Boy Sartana I did not expect the meal to be this good like what's your secret? Shaggy asked.

Many flavors are complemented by others so I integrated them together. Sartana replied.

Well I am glad everyone had enjoyed their meal I suppose I'd better get to cleaning and getting ready for class. Sartana stated.

The girls and Miss Grimwood left while Shaggy and Scooby stayed behind long enough to talk to Sartana.

Listen Sartana I know this hasn't been your month here having a hard time adjusting to being around girls all the time and having people think bad of you from your dad and all.

But what you did toady was really something and we think that it may have started to get through to the girls to see the good guy you really are. Shaggy said heartfelt.

"Gee Thanks Shaggy that really meant a lot coming from you." Sartana said.
1252212121111.title: mmm delicous

12522121211112.content:
Meanwhile in Sartana Castle an evil plan was being put in motion...

Sartana II in his laziness has sent for the Naga bounty hunter Raspaires.

"Thank you for coming on such short notice" said Sartana II.

"Well I asssssume you will make this worth my time your highnesssss." Hissed Raspaires.

"Indeed I shall, but first you must take on the task at hand." said Sartana II.

"Whom issss it that you require me to find?"

"My son Sartana Dementia III, you'll know him when you see him he looks like this." (hands her a photo of the jag of a son).

"My word he's hideoussss"

"He looks like I do."

"I know I'm ssssorry for him."

"Do you want my gold?"

"Oh right, yessss of courssse, I will use all of my power to disposssse of him as necesssssary"

(Using her powers Raspaires turns herself into a decorative stone statue. Sartana II has her shiped to his son. Sartana III likes how realistic the statue looks and sets it by his bed.).

(At night whilst Sartana is asleep Raspaires turns back to her normal self.)

*Raspaires slithers up to Sartana and begins to beat him into submission until she believes he's dead then quickly retreats back to the castle leaving him to be found by his friends in the morn.*
12522121211112.title: a disturbance

125221212111121.content:
Miss Grimwood, Shaggy, Scooby, Scrappy, and the girls are sitting at the table for breakfast when they notice Sartana isn't at the table

"Miss Grimwood is Sartana still asleep?" Tanis asked.

"I don't know. Could one of you go check on him?" Miss Grimwood asked.

"I would be glad to." Sibella said raising her hand.

Sibella went upstairs to check on Sartana. She opened the door and three seconds later everyone at the table could hear Sibella's blood curdling scream.

It's at that time that the Girls and the teachers knew something was wrong.

They all rush in to find Sartana in a state close to death unconscious on the floor.

The girls and the teachers start freaking out people start blurting our stuff like "What happened?" Who did this to him?" Is he going to be alright?"

"Enough I don't know what happened but everyone standing around and watching him doesn't help mien friends we need to give him medical assistance." Elsa shouted.

Elsa picks up Sartana and take him to her lab to get him hooked up to an IV and a monitor to make sure he doesn't flat-line.
125221212111121.title: In a coma

1252212121111211.content:
As Sartana lays there on her bed hooked up to many pieces of equipment to keep him stable the girls try to decide what to do.
"It's not possible to move him right now so it would be best in my opinion to keep him here." Elsa stated.
"Elsa who's going to protect us and keep us safe from Sartana's dad and demons." Tanis asked worried for the safety of Sartana and the girls.
"I don't know but I'm sure Sartana had a plan for a situation like this already maybe if you checked his room for what that might be so we can figure out what the plan is." Elsa spoke.
"What the hell are we even looking for?" Winnie growled.
"Winnie I know you care and your scared but getting at each others throats isn't helping. I'm sure Sartana has a journal or diary or maybe even a protocol manual somewhere in his room."
Sibella gathered everyone but Elsa to looks for what they needed.
"Elsa the reason why you need to stay is because you are strong and can protect him if something was to happen,seeing as they would try to go for him first.Second is because you know how to monitor those machines. Can we count on you? Sibella asked after explaining the plan.
Elsa smiled and nodded.The girls left the room to head for Sartana's and find what they need to stay safe.
Elsa looked down at Sartana and started to cry laying her head against him. with him not there she feels insecure and doesn't know what to do.
She thinks for a few moments and finds that it would be a good idea to try to talk to Sartana to give her a sense of company and maybe even snap him out of his coma.

(The rest of the chapter will be from the inside of Sartana's head hearing what Elsa has to say,and listening to his opinion of what Elsa is saying.)

Sartana I don't know if you can hear me but I feel really lost without you here right now.Elsa said carefully choosing her words.

Man this isn't good first some naga bitch tries to kill me and now everyone is worried about me while I lie here helpless to keep them safe.Sartana thought.

I want you to know I really like you,it's because you seem to not only make me feel beautiful but that you seem to look past my stitches.Elsa said crying next to him.

Wow I never had imagined she would figure out about the scar/stitches thing I'm actually flattered I mean she is cute she's nice and that German accent plays my heartstrings. Sartana thought.

and I want you to know I am a full woman even stitched together I'm pretty sure I could bear the thing you have wanted you know a child. Elsa thought kinda blushing at the thought of children.
Umm wow just wow that kind of offer is pretty tempting I mean she's telling me I could make a child with her in the traditional standard rather that making one on a science table hey you here that peter dammit show her I'm hearing it ah screw it I'll settle this one later.Sartana thought Wait maybe if I could accelerated my heart she would know I'm listening.
Sartana concentrated making his monitor beep a bit faster Elsa looks over ad realizes He can hear her and he's interested in this information.
